tagblock.name: Data

float32.name: AI Infantry-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI on other AI

float32.name: AI Vehicle-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI in a vehicle on other AI

float32.name: AI Player Vehicle-On-AI Weapon Damage Scale
float32.tooltip: Global scale on weapon damage made by AI in a vehicle with the player on other AI

tagblock.comment: The maximum ranges to which firing point evaluations will do pathfinding searches. INCREASING THESE VALUES WILL ALMOST CERTAINLY HAVE A NEGATIVE IMPACT ON PERFORMANCE.

float32.name: Scary Target Threshold
float32.tooltip: A target of this scariness is officially considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

float32.name: Scary Weapon Threshold
float32.tooltip: A weapon of this scariness is officially considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

float32.name: Invincible Scariness
float32.tooltip: when an actor's target is invincible, he is this much more scared

tagblock.comment: A few properties to help define when it is safe for a mission critical character to ressurect.

float32.name: Minimum Death Time
float32.tooltip: I will be dead for at least this long

float32.name: Projectile Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is a projectile within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

float32.name: Idle Clump Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is any enemy clump within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

float32.name: Dangerous Clump Distance
float32.tooltip: If there is any enemy clump with a status higher than idle within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

tagblock.comment: Some values to help you control how much guys will throttle when they want to stick with the rest of their squad.

float32.name: Stop Distance
float32.tooltip: At this distance from the squad, stop.

float32.name: Resume Distance
float32.tooltip: At this distance from the squad, start again.

float32.name: Minimum Distance
float32.tooltip: Start throttling back at this distance

float32.name: Maximum Distance
float32.tooltip: Maximum throttle scale at this distance

float32.name: Passthrough Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of passing through a patrol objective without pausing

float32.name: Search Phase Skip Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of skipping the search phase when stopped at a patrol objective

float32.name: Patrol Transition Timeout
float32.tooltip: If the squad takes more than this time to get to their new patrol point, cancel it and go on to the next.

float32.name: Patrol Maneuver Timeout
float32.tooltip: If the squad takes longer than this time to reposition within a patrol point (e.g. searching and pausing), cancel the point and go on to the next.
